name: ZtFramework
short_description:
The ZtFramework is the foundation library for all ZT projects. It contains code objects and helpers.

Please note that this is a project that is update on demand. No new features will be added to this project unless they are needed by another project. In other words, there are no milestones, goals, tickets, or roadmaps for this project.
summary: The foundation for all ZT software applications.
